Original: Oh, that request. It comes from that
intolerable man sitting over there.
[Page]
He calls himself... the lonely hunter
Dylan. Do I know him from somewhere?
Perhaps I am imagining things...
[Page]
You will have to ask him for more of
the details, but be careful. I shall
await your swift return.
Translation: Oh, that request. It comes from that
intolerable man sitting over there.
[Page]
He calls himself... the lonely hunter
Dylan. Do I know him from somewhere?
Perhaps I am imagining things...
[Page]
You will have to ask him for more of
the details, but be careful. I shall
await your swift return.

Original: What an unreasonable demand, defeating
that praying mantis monster. And he
calls himself aloof!
[Page]
Normally, it is best to run away from
a monster like that, but I suppose if
there is a request to be completed...
[Page]
Though I am surprised that you seemed
no worse for wear when you returned
after defeating it.
[Page]
Still, I forbid you to do anything
else so reckless...
Translation: What an unreasonable demand, defeating
that praying mantis monster. And he
calls himself aloof!
[Page]
Normally, it is best to run away from
a monster like that, but I suppose if
there is a request to be completed...
[Page]
Though I am surprised that you seemed
no worse for wear when you returned
after defeating it.
[Page]
Still, I forbid you to do anything
else so reckless...

Original: At the end of your bitter struggle,
you obtain a [Color:5][Item:1022][Color:0]!
[Page]
All that remains is to deliver it to
the client, [Color:5]Dylan[Color:0], without losing it.
Then the request will be fulfilled!
Translation: At the end of your bitter struggle,
you obtain a [Color:5][Item:1022][Color:0]!
[Page]
All that remains is to deliver it to
the client, [Color:5]Dylan[Color:0], without losing it.
Then the request will be fulfilled!

Original: You now recall accepting a request
to deliver a [Color:6][Number:0][Color:0] to Dylan,
the lonely hunter...
[Page]
If you mean to complete the request,
you must take care not to sell it.
Deliver it to your client at the bar.
